title: Nintendo Switch Sales Surpass 3DS - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.01.21
description:
Blessing and Tim joing forces and talk about the huge Nintendo Switch sales numbers, MLB The Show, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:02:40 - Housekeeping
Thank you to everyone who showed up over the weekend during our 2nd 12-hour livestream. We hit VARIOUS goals such as me and Andy playing scary games, Greg hosting The Blessing Show and more. If you missed it and want to know what supporting can get you, head over to KindaFunny.com/patreon.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: GrahamOfLegend, David Meintel, Trent Berrie, Black Jack, Luiz Aguiar (@8bitLuiz), James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), &The Nano Biologist
The Roper Report   -
00:04:20 -  Nintendo Switch has sold nearly 80 Million units - Christopher Dring @ GiBiz
00:17:19 - Can this only be attributed to the quarantine? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:22:50 - Speaking of Switch: Nintendo is Not Planning to Announce a New Switch Model 'Anytime Soon' - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:33:20 - MLB The Show 21 Coming to Xbox Series - Xbox Wire
00:36:15 - Do you think we will start seeing more PS studio games come to XBox? Do you see more non PS Studio PS exclusive games (ie Final Fantasy 7 Remake) coming to XBox? Or is the MLB The Show an anomaly, a one-off case scenario? - Best Friends Q:BJ Bernardo
00:40:10 - Sonic is speeding his way onto Netflix - Adele Ankers @ IGN
00:48:44 -  Ad  
00:51:38 - Sumo Group acquires Pixelant Games - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:52:40 - Another Cool Looking AAA game is coming out of China - Daniel Ahmad on Twitter
00:54:17 - Out today
Stock Talk  -
00:56:00 - Having all three games would be an incredible value proposition. It would also open these amazing games up to a whole new younger audience, and would be a great way to celebrate Metal Gear’s 35th Anniversary in 2022. Plus, who wouldn’t want a remake of Snake Eater? - NickNack
01:00:00 - Squad Up:Matt (Twitch) - nooddjob2020
01:02:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Tim
